text: When you're 28, science discovers a drug that stops all effects of aging, creating immortality. Your government decides to give the drug to all citizens under 26, but you and the rest of the “Lost Generations" are deemed too high-risk. When you're 85, the side effects are finally discovered.

When you're 28, science discovers a drug that stops all effects of aging, creating immortality. Your government decides to give the drug to all citizens under 26, but you and the rest of the “Lost Generations" are deemed too high-risk. When you're 85, the side effects are finally discovered. Can you survive the world's most dangerous and practical scientific experiment?

When you're 28, science discovers a drug that stops all effects of aging, creating immortality. Your government decides to give the drug to all citizens under 26, but you and the rest of the “Lost Generations" are deemed too high-risk. When you're 85, the side effects are finally discovered. Can you survive the world's most dangerous and practical scientific experiment? 

In the wake of the millions who've already died, you must fight your way through a wasteland full of radioactive mutants, murderous gangs, and

When you're 28, science discovers a drug that stops all effects of aging, creating immortality. Your government decides to give the drug to all citizens under 26, but you and the rest of the “Lost Generations" are deemed too high-risk. When you're 85, the side effects are finally discovered. Can you survive the world's most dangerous and practical scientific experiment? In the wake of the millions who've already died, you must fight your way through a wasteland full of radioactive mutants, murderous gangs, and animals eating each other including humans and babies. If only things would have been different back then and people would refuse the drug or have it been optional to take it it would have been a much better world now.

When you're 28, science discovers a drug that stops all effects of aging, creating immortality. Your government decides to give the drug to all citizens under 26, but you and the rest of the “Lost Generations" are deemed too high-risk. When you're 85, the side effects are finally discovered. Can you survive the world's most dangerous and practical scientific experiment? In the wake of the millions who've already died, you must fight your way through a wasteland full of radioactive mutants, murderous gangs, and animals eating each other including humans and babies. If only things would have been different back then and people would refuse the drug or have it been optional to take it it would have been a much better world now. How You'll Survive: You're all alone in a hostile wasteland with no weapons, just your wits.

Can you survive the world's most dangerous and practical scientific experiment? In the wake of the millions who've already died, you must fight your way through a wasteland full of radioactive mutants, murderous gangs, and animals eating each other including humans and babies. If only things would have been different back then and people would refuse the drug or have it been optional to take it it would have been a much better world now. How You'll Survive: You're all alone in a hostile wasteland with no weapons, just your wits. There is no way i could survive with just the basics like water and food because once the mutants find me and know where i'm hiding i'm just going to be another piece of meat for them.
